alert.note: Alert for Citrus (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 31 at 5:01PM EDT until May 31 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM EDT FOR NORTHWESTERN CITRUS COUNTY... At 500 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crystal River Airport, or 10 miles northwest of Homosassa Springs, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Pine Ridge, Crystal River Airport, Black Diamond, Crystal Manor, Beverly Hills and Lecanto. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
